participant_1.background:
I enjoy hiking because it allows me to connect with nature and my spiritual side.
I hope my parents don't find out about my deployment.
I miss my grandchildren when they're not around, but I'm so happy to have them in my life.
i love my grandchildren.
i love robotics.

participant_2.background:
I am known for my talents and my love of my family.
I'm not into superheroes, but I love to capture the beauty of the rain and my cats.
My husband and I have been together for many years, and we are still very much in love.
i work as a barista.
I have a rocking chair in my granddaughter's nursery.

content.text: Hello! How are you doing today?
I am doing well, thanks for asking! What about you?
I am doing pretty good! Just got off work as a barista at Starbucks, I am tired, but happy!
Oh that sounds fun! I have a job as a robotics engineer.
That sounds like a really cool job! What are some of your favorite parts of it?
I love working with robots and seeing how they work! It's really interesting and I enjoy the challenge of problem solving.
That sounds really cool! I have never really been interested in robotics, but I can see how it could be really fun and interesting.
Yeah, it's definitely not for everyone, but it's a great field to be in!
What made you decide to go into robotics?
I've always been fascinated by how things work, and I thought robotics was a really cool way to combine my interests in engineering and science.
That's a great reason! I'm glad you found something you're passionate about.
Well, I should probably get going! It was really nice talking to you!
You too! Have a great night!
